content.query:
-----------------------------
--- CREATE CREDENTIAL  ---
----------------------------
CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL karurcreds
WITH IDENTITY = 'Managed Identity'


----------------------------------
--- CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE---
-----------------------------------

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE raw_external_source
WITH
(
    LOCATION = 'https://azuresynpasedatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/bronze',
    CREDENTIAL = karurcreds
)
----------------------------------
--- CREATE PARQUET FILE FORMAT ---
----------------------------------

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT parquet_format
WITH
(
    FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET,
    DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'
)

----------------------------------
--- CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT ---
-----------------------------------

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT csv_file_format_type2
WITH
(
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
    FORMAT_OPTIONS (
                    FIELD_TERMINATOR =','
                   
    )
)
-----------------------------
--- OPENROWSET FUNCTION  ---
----------------------------

SELECT * FROM 
OPENROWSET(
      BULK 'revenue',
      DATA_SOURCE = 'raw_external_source',
      FORMAT = 'CSV',
      PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
      HEADER_ROW = TRUE
      ) as openquery1
